definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: And you express that "I'm feeling this way, is it ok?"
sentences.chinese: 你可以表達“我有這樣子的感覺，沒問題吧？”

sentences.english: Furthermore, the expression of MMP9 in tumor tissues was positively associated with the MVD val-ue.
sentences.chinese: 腫瘤組織中MMP9的表達與微血管密度呈正相關。

sentences.english: Don't let unexpressed emotions build up inside of you.
sentences.chinese: 若你有強烈的情感，挑出它們表達他們。

sentences.english: The collection of different antibody specificities expressed in an individual.
sentences.chinese: 是表達在一個體內特異性不同的抗體的總和。

sentences.english: How beautiful maleness is, if it finds its right expression.
sentences.chinese: 雄性是多美啊，假如它發現它正確的表達方式。

sentences.english: Intents express abstract, high-level policy requirements.
sentences.chinese: 意圖表達抽象的高級策略需求。

sentences.english: Redundancy is a linguistic phenomenon that the linguistic form is more than its linguistic content.
sentences.chinese: 羨餘現象，是指語言的表達形式多於表達內容。

sentences.english: Redundancy is a linguistic phenomenon that the linguistic form is more than its linguistic content.
sentences.chinese: 羨餘現象，是指語言的表達形式多於表達內容。

sentences.english: The image of youth comes from the artist's self-reflection and expression of emotion.
sentences.chinese: 少年的形象是出於作者對自我情緒的反思和表達。

sentences.english: The expression is validated in Synopsys device simulation tools MEDICI.
sentences.chinese: 表達式用MEDICI器件模擬軟件進行了驗證。

sentences.english: Some of the most popular expressions are those that are guaranteed not to offend anyone.
sentences.chinese: 一些最流行的表達是那些保證不會得罪任何人的表達。

sentences.english: Some of the most popular expressions are those that are guaranteed not to offend anyone.
sentences.chinese: 一些最流行的表達是那些保證不會得罪任何人的表達。

sentences.english: To me, dreams about flying express feelings about freedom;
sentences.chinese: 就我看來，有關飛翔的夢表達了對自由的渴望。

sentences.english: Scribbling can help infants and toddlers learn to draw and express themselves.
sentences.chinese: 狂草可以幫助嬰幼兒學畫畫和表達自己。

sentences.english: First off, allow us to apologize for the abductions.
sentences.chinese: 首先，請容許咱們爲綁票地球人而表達歉意。

sentences.english: However, high-producing lines that express these genes are not generally available.
sentences.chinese: 但是，表達這些基因的高產品系並非隨處可得。

definition: to pass on/to convey/to relay/to transmit/transmission
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
to transmit/to pass on to sb else/(math.) transitive
to show/to show off/to display/to manifest/expression/manifestation/show/display/performance (at work etc)/behavior
to come out/to emerge/to reveal/to display
to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
